name: Robotatoes
description:
DESCRIPTION

As a potato compete with others to create your own robot by collecting best parts from randomly appearing robot arms, legs, head and weapons!

Local multiplayer for 2-4 players

CONTROLS

GAMEPADS ONLY

Move: left analog

Dash: A (on Xbox pad) or SQUARE (on PS pad)

CREDITS

Malyglut - programming

Marcin "eMka" Wierzchoś - programming

Tomasz Dziuba - programming

Mateusz "szkut" Waszut - 3D art, animation

Paulina Gondek - 2D art

Maciej Szukiel - 3D art

Borys Szafran - SFX

Sebastian Senski - that guy with a broken arm who complains about everything (and sometimes Unity and programming support)
